Welcome to Sustainability Week!


As we step into Sustainability week, immerse yourself in the impact we create together through this week's initiatives and workshops.


Have you signed up for tomorrow's Sustainable Fashion & Fabric Waste Upcycling workshop <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1017&user=10620> ? 


Click here to c <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1016&user=10620> heck out what's happening this week.

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1018&user=10620> 	

Introducing Edutainment by the Retail Academy, your new destination for fun, fast, and future-focused learning!

Edutainment is here to transform the way retail teams learn anytime, anywhere. From bite-sized content that delivers real-world takeaways to exclusive retail conversations with our Group experts, this platform is built to keep you informed, inspired, and one step ahead.

Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1018&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

On-the-Job Programme in Egypt

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1019&user=10620> 	

Announcing the successful completion of the first cycle of our dynamic On-the-Job Programme, which launched across Egypt this past March! This initiative is designed to empower our retail teams with practical, real-life knowledge and skills essential for delivering exceptional customer experiences every single day.

Click here to read more about the On-the-Job Programme and what our leaders are saying. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1019&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

SS25 Collection with guess at al-ula

Top-tier press, influencers & the iconic GUESS Girls unite for unforgettable moments and an exclusive preview of the SS25 collection on the runway.

SS25 Collection with guess at al-ula

Top-tier press, influencers & the iconic GUESS Girls unite for unforgettable moments and an exclusive preview of the SS25 collection on the runway.

Set against the stunning backdrop of Saudi Arabia, Al-Ula came alive in true GUESS style.

Celebrating fashion, culture, and bold new beginnings.
